page.title: 15FOOD
page.content: In the old days people grew or reared nearly all their own food, but nowadays most people tend to buy it from shops, markets or supermarkets growing only what they can use themseleves or freeze for the winter months. For most of us meat from animals plays a large part in our diet but some people think it is wrong to kill animals for food, so they only eat vegetables. They are called 'Vegetarians'. Three of the most common meats are Pork, Beef and Mutton. Foreign food has become very popular. There are two Chinese restaurants in the town of Castle Douglas. People are more aware of what foods are good for you. Foods such as brown bread, milk, vegetables and fruit are good for you where as chips, sweets, doughnuts and the like are unhealthy.
